primary.context: Caller immediately requested a human agent at the start of the call.
primary.detail: The initial transfer attempt failed after a long queue wait, and the AI re-engaged the caller.

secondary.request: fix missing contract on portal dashboard
secondary.context: After the first transfer failed, the caller explained that one of their properties (Mizner Place) is missing from their online account.
secondary.detail: The AI identified the issue as a technical account discrepancy and routed the caller back to the concierge queue.

steps: AI attempted transfer to concierge; caller waited in queue for approximately 19 minutes.
Transfer failed (no agents available); AI re-engaged to offer automated help.
Caller provided phone number, name, and state for verification.
Caller reported a missing timeshare (Mizner Place) on their online dashboard.
AI confirmed the contract exists in the system but acknowledged it's missing from the user's portal.
AI transferred the caller back to the concierge department for technical account resolution.

corrections.note: User corrected resort name to Meissner/Mizner.

actions.detail: First transfer attempt timed out after 19 minutes.
Second transfer to concierge for portal issue.

insights.summary: The caller initially wanted a representative but was forced back to the AI after a 20-minute wait. The AI then successfully verified the caller and identified a portal data discrepancy before routing them back to a human agent.
insights.verbatim: Account working. Mizner is missing from dashboard.
